body.name: COSTWAY Executive 3D Massage Office Chair, Faux Leather Computer Desk Chair w/Adjustable Headrest & Lumbar Support, High Back Rolling Home Office Chair with Flip-up Armrests, Remote Control, Black
features: 【3D Kneading Massage with Remote】Featuring 2-point kneading massage, the executive office chair provides 3D massaging effect with forward and reverse rotating modes to greatly relieve back pain for relaxing. With a remote control, you can conveniently adjust the massage and time settings (5/10/15min timer) as you like.

【All-day Adjustable Comfort】The computer task chair can adjust height from 19” to 23” to fit different heights of desk. The headrest can adjust height and recling up and down between 40°, and padded flip-up armrests give support for your arms. When not in use, you can flip up the armrests to allow the chair to fit under the desk for space saving. 15°rocking function also provide ultra-softness for relaxation.

【4-Layer Seat Cushion for Comfort】The high back desk chair seat features 4 layers including waterproof leathaire, high-density sponge, thickened sponge, and supportive plywood, which ensures high safety and stability for long-lasting use. The 5.5” thick waterfall seat can well support your hips, and with lumbar support, the office chair relieves your fatigue after long periods of sitting .

【360° Swivel Chair with Five-star Base】The rolling executive chair stands by 5 universal nylon casters, which enables flexible movement and swivel. The casters can roll smoothly and silently on any floor, preventing disturbance and floor scratches. In addition, the plated 5-claw base is sturdy and durable, which is able to provide a max load of 300 lbs.

【Ergonomic Design for Various Places】The kneading massage chair perfectly fits the curve of human body and better support your back, head, neck, waist, arms to bring you relaxation. It’s ideal for office, media room, or living room to meet all your needs for studying, working, or daily leisure. The sleek surface is also easy to clean, allowing simple maintenance for your convenience.
body.description: Description This multifunctional massage office chair will become a perfect choice for you to give your lumbar, back, head, and arm support for great comfort and convenience. Adjustable seat height is convenient to accommodate different table heights for your needs. Adjust headrest, 15° rocking function, and 360° rotation provide additional support and comfort. Flip-up armrests can support your arms and also can be adjusted to let the chair storage under the desk for space saving. A concise and stylish executive office chair provides comfy seats for your office, media room, or living room, complementing your home or office perfectly! Feature Kneading massage mode with remote can realize A-B two direction selection Solid frame with class-3 certificated gas cylinder to hold the capacity of up to 300lbs /135kg 4-layer soft cushion with waterfall curvature to reduce sitting pressure 4” adjustable seat height, 40° reclining padded headrest and 15°rocking mode to meet different needs Removable lumbar cushion and flipped-up armrests give comfort and support for your arms and lumbar 360-degree PU casters for convenient moving around Suitable for living room, study, bedroom, office, etc Easy to assemble with the detailed instruction Specification Color: Black Materials: Leathaire, Sponge, Plywood, Nylon , PU Product Dimension: 29" x 30.5" x 47-51"/73 x 77 x 120-130 cm (W x D x H) Size of Seat: 22" x 22"/56 x 56 cm (W x D) Size of Lumbar Cushion: 14" x 13"/35 x 33 cm (W x H) Size of Headrest: 11.5" x 6.5"/29 x 16 cm (W x H) Backrest Height: 25.5"/65 cm Armrest Height: 28"-32"/72-82 cm Seat Height: 19"-23"/48-58 cm Diameter of Base: 25.5"/65 cm Net Weight: 38.5 lbs/17.5 kg Weight Capacity: 300 lbs/135 kg Package Includes: 1 x Office Chair 1 x Instruction

Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased an office chair with a built-in massage feature, and it has been a game-changer for my productivity and comfort at work. The chair offers various massage settings, from gentle pulsing to intense kneading, which have helped to ease my back and shoulder tension. The ergonomic design and adjustable lum.
